title: What If INCUBUS Wrote "Digital Bath" By DEFTONES?
description: Early Incubus, of course. The post What If INCUBUS Wrote "Digital Bath" By DEFTONES? appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
text: YouTuber, musician, and spot-on impersonator Mac Glocky is back with yet another masterful reimagining of a classic. This time, Mac Glocky took on Deftones' classic "Digital Bath" in the style of some early, post-funk Incubus. I guess none of this is super surprising either, considering Mac Glocky released an entire Deftones-styled covers album called Defstyle in 2023. It's good, too! Want More Metal? html:
YouTuber, musician, and spot-on impersonator Mac Glocky is back with yet another masterful reimagining of a classic. This time, Mac Glocky took on Deftones' classic "Digital Bath" in the style of some early, post-funk Incubus.

I guess none of this is super surprising either, considering Mac Glocky released an entire Deftones-styled covers album called Defstyle in 2023. It's good, too!
